title: APPAREL Expert Designer
job_overview:
Custom Apparel Graphic Designer (Sororities & Fraternities)
We're looking for a Graphic Designer to create custom APPAREL DESIGNS and keep files organized for production.
Salary: Between 600-700 USD per month

Job description:
- Design apparel graphics (shirts, hoodies, jerseys, hats, etc.)
- Ensure designs are print-ready and properly formatted
- Create vector files
- Revise designs based on clients feedback
- Meet deadlines and communicate if you need anything
Requirements:
- Proficient in Adobe Illustrator & Photoshop
- Strong vector graphics & apparel design skills
- Ability to follow directions and adapt styles (Fast respond time during working hours is really important)
- Experience with print-ready files & production is a plus
- Apparel or branding design experience is a plus
Please send your portfolio with Apparel Graphic Designs!
